basics.name: Hugo Arganda
basics.summary: Program Manager experienced in leading multidisciplinary teams (up to 30 members), with more than 10 years of experience in the automotive and telecommunications industries. Skilled, innovative, and self-learner. Proficient in C, C++, and Python.
